subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: William Bonnet of France won a sprint to take the 125-mile second stage of the Paris-Nice race, and Lars Boom of the Netherlands maintained the overall lead by five seconds.
snippet: William Bonnet of France won a sprint to take the 125-mile second stage of the Paris-Nice race, and Lars Boom of the Netherlands maintained the overall lead by five seconds.
